mapper.insert: insert into articles (writer_id, title, content, reg_date, count) values (#{writerId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regDate}, #{count})
mapper.select: select art_num artNum, writer_id writerId, title, content, reg_date regDate, count from articles
select art_num artNum, writer_id writerId, title, content, reg_date regDate, count from articles where art_num like #{value}
mapper.update: update articles set count = count+1 where art_num like #{value}
update articles set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where art_num like #{artNum}
mapper.delete: delete from articles where art_num like #{artNum}
